comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: With some big exchanges and lending services collapsing last year, there is need for a better exchange. The thing about exchanges is liquidity and how secure the exchange is, I search through Twitter to find those people recommending this exchange and couldn't find any, this just shows that there is a huge work for your team to do if you want to gain any traction at all in this market

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: I signed up to the exchange thinking that it would be easy to buy Me sell coins like Binance buy the website is not easy to understand. When I clicked buy or seel. I didn't see any link to click and add account to receive the Fiat currency if IAM selling. And I didn't see my wallet address. Everything there is just confusing person. I only saw UID number below my email. And I don't know the uses of that number. So I will want the op to tell me more about the it

When I clicked buy or seel. I didn't see any link to click and add account to receive the Fiat currency if IAM selling. And I didn't see my wallet address. Everything there is just confusing person. So I will want the op to tell me more about the it Refresh the page and generate deposit address.only users with  (KYC Level 2) can trade. (verify email and phone number).  UID can be use as receiving address for internal transfers (no transaction fee for internal transfers.)

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: GlobeDex on May 08, 2023, 02:22:32 AMGlobeDex Official Coin (Released)Website: https://gbdx.globe-dex.comExplorer: https://gbdxinfo.globe-dex.comYour "coin" doesn't seem to have clear purpose or whitepaper. I mean i can read that at some point in the future you can earn it by doing micro tasks and you can buy "goods and services" with it. But that could mean anything so maybe elaborate on that. It's very much different to invest into exchange coin that is used to cut fees, then invest to exchange coin that can be used for IEOs like in binance, if the amount used will get burned or if it pays dividends. I for one wouldn't buy exchange token that's only being used for fees and most likely put back to market after that. You need a clear plan for it.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: GlobeDex on May 28, 2023, 05:00:57 AMQuote from: Agbe on May 25, 2023, 10:02:07 PMI signed up to the exchange thinking that it would be easy to buy Me sell coins like Binance buy the website is not easy to understand. When I clicked buy or seel. I didn't see any link to click and add account to receive the Fiat currency if IAM selling. And I didn't see my wallet address. Everything there is just confusing person. I only saw UID number below my email. And I don't know the uses of that number. So I will want the op to tell me more about the it Refresh the page and generate deposit address.only users with  (KYC Level 2) can trade. (verify email and phone number).  UID can be use as receiving address for internal transfers (no transaction fee for internal transfers.)since you are a new trading platform, i don't think users will be confident in accomplishing their kyc level 2 requirements on your platform. better allow users to trade if they deposit a minimum amount of let's say $100. but if you will implement for all users to undergo kyc, you may find it difficult in getting on board traders.
